name.japanese: サラサラの実 モデル：アホロートル
name.romanized: Sara Sara no Mi, Moderu: Ahōrōtoru

description: A Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into an axolotl. In Smiley's case, this fruit was fed to condensed poison gas, creating a living poison creature.

users.circumstances: Caesar fed this Devil Fruit to condensed H2S poison gas from the Punk Hazard disaster, creating the living weapon Smiley

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create a spherical territory where they can manipulate anything, including separating and switching objects and body parts. Known as the Ultimate Devil Fruit.

users.circumstances: Law ate this fruit and uses it to perform miraculous surgical operations and combat techniques

abilityReveals.description: The Ope Ope no Mi allows the user to remove hearts from bodies and keep them alive separately. This ability is revealed to have been used by Law to create an alliance with Caesar, giving his own heart in exchange for Monet's.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Revealed when Caesar explains that Law gave him his heart as part of their deal, and Vergo now holds it as leverage against Law.

weaknesses.weakness: If the user's heart is removed by their own power, others can use it to torture or control them
